Class HistoricalEvent

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.history.HistoricalEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Locatable, Identifiable<String>, Temporal
public class HistoricalEvent extends Object implements Identifiable<String>, Locatable, Temporal
Represents a historical event with fuzzy date support.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
